mapper.select: SELECT P.ID, P.NAME, P.CATEGORY, P.DETAIL, P.STATUS, P.QUANTITY, P.SELLER_ID, P.SELL_START_DATETIME, P.SELL_END_DATETIME, P.DISPLAY_NAME, P.UNIT_PRICE, P.BRAND, P.DELIVERY_FEE_TYPE, P.DELIVERY_METHOD, P.DELIVERY_DEFAULT_FEE, P.FREE_SHIP_OVER_AMOUNT, P.RETURN_CENTER_CODE, P.CREATED_DATE, P.UPDATED_DATE, I.ID AS IMG_ID, I.IMG_URL AS IMG_URL, I.CREATED_DATE AS IMG_CREATED_DATE, I.UPDATED_DATE AS IMG_UPDATED_DATE FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE I ON P.ID = I.PRODUCT_ID WHERE P.ID = #{productId}

SELECT ID, NAME, CATEGORY, DETAIL, STATUS, QUANTITY, SELLER_ID, SELL_START_DATETIME, SELL_END_DATETIME, DISPLAY_NAME, UNIT_PRICE, BRAND, DELIVERY_FEE_TYPE, DELIVERY_METHOD, DELIVERY_DEFAULT_FEE, FREE_SHIP_OVER_AMOUNT, RETURN_CENTER_CODE, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE ID = #{productId} LIMIT 1 FOR UPDATE

SELECT P.ID, P.NAME, P.CATEGORY, P.DETAIL, P.STATUS, P.QUANTITY, P.SELLER_ID, P.SELL_START_DATETIME, P.SELL_END_DATETIME, P.DISPLAY_NAME, P.UNIT_PRICE, P.BRAND, P.DELIVERY_FEE_TYPE, P.DELIVERY_METHOD, P.DELIVERY_DEFAULT_FEE, P.FREE_SHIP_OVER_AMOUNT, P.RETURN_CENTER_CODE, P.CREATED_DATE, P.UPDATED_DATE, I.ID AS IMG_ID, I.IMG_URL AS IMG_URL, I.CREATED_DATE AS IMG_CREATED_DATE, I.UPDATED_DATE AS IMG_UPDATED_DATE FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE I ON P.ID = I.PRODUCT_ID WHERE P.ID IN
(#{id})

SELECT ID, NAME, CATEGORY, DETAIL, STATUS, QUANTITY, SELLER_ID, SELL_START_DATETIME, SELL_END_DATETIME, DISPLAY_NAME, UNIT_PRICE, BRAND, DELIVERY_FEE_TYPE, DELIVERY_METHOD, DELIVERY_DEFAULT_FEE, FREE_SHIP_OVER_AMOUNT, RETURN_CENTER_CODE, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE ID IN
(#{id})
FOR UPDATE

SELECT P.ID, P.NAME, P.CATEGORY, P.DETAIL, P.STATUS, P.QUANTITY, P.SELLER_ID, P.SELL_START_DATETIME, P.SELL_END_DATETIME, P.DISPLAY_NAME, P.UNIT_PRICE, P.BRAND, P.DELIVERY_FEE_TYPE, P.DELIVERY_METHOD, P.DELIVERY_DEFAULT_FEE, P.FREE_SHIP_OVER_AMOUNT, P.RETURN_CENTER_CODE, P.CREATED_DATE, P.UPDATED_DATE FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN ORDERS_PRODUCT_RELATION OPR ON OPR.PRODUCT_ID = P.ID WHERE OPR.GROUP_ID = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (NAME, CATEGORY, DETAIL, STATUS, SELLER_ID, SELL_START_DATETIME, SELL_END_DATETIME, DISPLAY_NAME, UNIT_PRICE, BRAND, DELIVERY_FEE_TYPE, DELIVERY_METHOD, DELIVERY_DEFAULT_FEE, FREE_SHIP_OVER_AMOUNT, RETURN_CENTER_CODE, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE) VALUES (#{name}, #{category}, #{detail}, #{status}, #{sellerId}, #{sellStartDatetime}, #{sellEndDatetime}, #{displayName}, #{unitPrice}, #{brand}, #{deliveryFeeType}, #{deliveryMethod}, #{deliveryDefaultFee}, #{freeShipOverAmount}, #{returnCenterCode}, now(), now())

INSERT INTO product_image (PRODUCT_ID, IMG_URL, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE) VALUES
(#{image.productId}, #{image.imgUrl}, now(), now())
